import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import axios from "axios"; import LoadingBox from ".components/LoadingBox"; import MessageBox from ".components/MessageBox" export default function VehicleDetailsForm(props) { const { handleChange, checkoutForm } = props; const [carModels, setCarModels] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const {data} = await axios.get('http://165.227.108.163:5050/cars/get_all_makes/') setLoading(false); setCarModels(data); } catch(err) { setError(err.message); setLoading(false); } }; fetchData(); },[]) return (
You are ready to book. CONTINUE!!!
Vehicle Year {loading ? () : error?({error}): ( { carModels.map((carModel) => ( )) } ) } Vehicle Make Vehicle Model
Send a copy of the quote to First Available Date Phone Is it operable?{" "}
By providing your information, you agree to our privacy policy and SMS notifications. Up to 8msgs/mo. Msg&data rates may apply. Text STOP to unsubscribe.
); }
